rules.name: Role_contains_any_ENT
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 4 OR (3 AND 8) ) AND NOT(5) AND NOT(6) AND NOT(7)
rules.label: Role contains any ENT

Flow.description: GTMS-28108 - Make "Accepted Transfer Feedback" Mandatory on all ADR Transfers Corrected Typo in Selection screen. -- Always run this flow in SystemContext not Default mode. Added: Oppty creation option GTMS-25521 GTMS-25521-AEException route - need to optimize in fast followup Jira with Roel GTMS-New Contact Selection for New Opportunity - Add On
Flow.label: Accept ADR Transfer
